mapper.update: update `clienttransferrecord` set client_id = #{name.id}, qq = #{qq}, tel = #{tel}, currentDate = #{currentdate}, original_trace_man_id = #{originalTraceManId}, current_trace_man = #{currentTraceManId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, client_id, qq, tel, currentDate, original_trace_man_id, current_trace_man from `clienttransferrecord`

select c.id, c.client_id, c.qq, c.tel, c.currentDate, c.original_trace_man_id originalTraceMan_id,originalTraceMan.username originalTraceMan_username, c.current_trace_man currentTraceMan_id,currentTraceMan.username currentTraceMan_username from `clienttransferrecord` c left join client client on client.id=c.client_id limit #{startIndex},#{rows}
select count(c.id) from `clienttransferrecord` c left join client client on client.id=c.client_id left join Employee originalTraceMan originalTraceMan.id=c.original_trace_man_id
